repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:0.10 
MAINTAINER Alexander Harding <alexander.harding@software.dell.com> 

RUN apt-get update && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y vim ruby-full rubygems && \
gem install compass && \
npm install -g bower grunt && npm cache clean --force; && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

ADD . /code 
WORKDIR /code 

RUN npm install && \
bower install --allow-root && npm cache clean --force;

EXPOSE 9000 
CMD npm start
